## isManagedRemirrorProvider variable

Checks if this is a ManagedRemirrorProvider which pulls in the manager from the context and places it's children inside the RemirrorProvider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isManagedRemirrorProvider: <GOptions extends {} = any>(value: unknown) => value is RemirrorElement<GOptions>
```
